abstract: Twitter is in advanced talks with Google and Microsoft about licensing its data feed to the companies’ search engines, AllThingsDigital reported.
snippet: Twitter is in advanced talks with Google and Microsoft about licensing its data feed to the companies’ search engines, AllThingsDigital reported.
lead_paragraph: Twitter is in advanced talks with Google and Microsoft about licensing its data feed to the companies’ search engines, AllThingsDigital reported.

headline.main: Twitter Said to Talk Deals With Google and Microsoft
